title: Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a crocodile in a dream by Al-NabulsiWhoever sees that a crocodile drags him into the water and kills him, it means that God knows that the sleeper will be exposed to killing and violence by the police or the powerful authorities in power. As for whoever sees that the crocodile hit him and touched him, either with his head or with his skin, this means that he will take his enemy's money. As for whoever sees the crocodile escaping him to the beach, it means the sleeper's victory over his enemy until he takes the enemy's money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from a crocodile If the sleeper dreams that he is escaping from a crocodile, this means that the sleeper has great fears in his life and is afraid to confront them or approach them. Interpretation of swimming with a crocodile in a dream If you dream that you are swimming in the water with a crocodile, this means, God knows best, that you need emotional feelings, tenderness, self-control, and perhaps a message to start looking for a wife if you are not married. Interpretation of a crocodile bite in a dream If you dream that a crocodile bites you in a dream, this means that you are ignoring many important issues in your life or that you need to stop these issues and take care of them, solve them and eliminate them. Seeing a crocodile in the garden If you dream that you saw a crocodile captured in a garden The interpretation of the dream is that the sleeper has a very large number of talents and gifts that God Almighty has given him, and that he must search well to develop and benefit from them. Interpretation of killing a crocodile in a dream If the sleeper dreams that he killed a crocodile in a dream, the meaning of the dream is that the sleeper has a very large force of anger inside him and this may mean that the sleeper is about to make an important fateful decision in the future. Period. Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees a crocodile in a dream, this means that she complains of injustice and that there is someone who persecutes and oppresses her while trying to escape from her. As for the one who sees the crocodile completely calm and does not move, it is the interpretation of the dream and God knows that the sleeper will be exposed to a very large conspiracy from one of the people very close to him. As for if the sleeper dreams that there is a group of crocodiles looking at him, but they do not approach him in the interpretation of the dream, and God knows that there are those who plot evil and conspire against him. We have explained to you a number of interpretations of seeing a crocodile in a dream for many scholars and in many cases.

If an unmarried woman sees a crocodile in a dream, this means that she is complaining of injustice and that there is someone who is persecuting and persecuting her while trying to escape from it. title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing tea in a dream

preview.html: Seeing tea in a dream is one of the things that many dreamers wonder about, due to its strangeness, especially if the colors of tea differ from one dream to another and from one person to another. Seeing tea in dreams Many jurists agreed on the extent of the good tidings of seeing tea in a dream, because it is in fact a favorite drink for many, which is reflected in its interpretations in the dream, at all levels of one's life. While the student who sees tea in his sleep interprets this vision as obtaining many distinguished grades, which are due to his diligence and constant diligence in obtaining the best grades. Seeing tea in a dream by Ibn Sirin Tea cultivation was not a common crop in the era of Ibn Sirin. However, in comparison with all the drinks known at that time, we found that seeing tea in a dream indicates that there are many good things in the dreamer's life and good news for him on the way to him. Also, the girl who faces many problems and cannot understand well with her parents and sees tea in her dream, this symbolizes that she will be able to resolve her differences with them with ease and ease, which will make her happy and bring her a lot of comfort to her heart after she got tired of arguing with them constantly. Interpretation of Dream Secrets is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write a site about Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing tea in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is offering tea, this symbolizes that she will get rid of all the problems and worries that she suffered from in the previous days and gives her happy news that the future is much better than this. Imagine.. Similarly, a girl who sees a cup of green tea in her hand interprets her dream with many positive changes in her life that she did not imagine in all stages of her life, whether emotional, practical or even psychological. Seeing tea in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a lot of tea in her dream, this symbolizes that she and her husband will enjoy an abundance of sustenance, and they will be able to obtain everything they have always wanted in life as a reward for their good deeds. Their actions and the good performance of their prayers and charity. While a woman who sees herself in a dream offering tea to her husband, her vision shows the amount of love and understanding they enjoy, which was not easy to achieve due to the various difficulties and disagreements they faced at the beginning of their marriage. And at least the minimum. Seeing tea in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is drinking tea and enjoying its taste, this symbolizes that blessings and abundant food will be her share, and she will not suffer and will not need anyone's support at all. While a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is offering tea indicates that she will give birth to her healthy child with ease and comfort, and will be reassured about her health and safety, and soon he will agree with her eyes. There is no need for anxiety and tension that she always feels and it is better to leave it to

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna hair by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about henna hair has many connotations indicating good and evil, and depends on the type of dreamer, whether male or female, his condition in the dream, and how he feels? Sad or happy, and we will learn in detail about all the interpretations of this topic below. Interpretation of a dream about henna hair: Seeing henna hair in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that she will soon marry a good young man who loves her. Interpret the dream about henna hair as happiness and goodness coming to the dreamer in the coming period, God willing. For a pregnant woman, seeing henna hair in a dream means that her birth is near and will be smooth and easy, God willing, and without pain. A married woman who sees henna hair in a dream indicates that her life is stable and happy in her life with her husband, and she will be surprised by the number of happy events that will delight her heart. In general, henna hair is considered a sign of joy and happiness that the dreamer enjoys in his life. Seeing henna hair in a dream indicates coverage, loss of worries, and relief from the suffering that the dreamer suffered in the previous period. A man who sees henna hair in his dream is a sign of ease of things and success in the steps. Which he will face in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about henna hair by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of henna for hair in a person’s dream as goodness, abundance, and food that the dreamer will enjoy in the coming period, God willing. A dream about henna hair symbolizes good news and a close marriage to a fair and beautiful girl. A woman’s dream of seeing that she puts henna on her hair and it becomes beautiful indicates that God will heal her from the diseases that she suffers from and which were the cause of her sadness. Seeing henna hair in a dream is an indication of abundant nutrition and overcoming the crises and problems that plague the dreamer’s life. In the case of applying henna. On the hair in a dream on the left hand, this is an unpleasant sign of bad events that the dreamer will be exposed to. Interpretation of a dream about henna hair for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees henna in her hair in a dream symbolizes that she will find her life partner in the coming period in the form of a good man who will love her, appreciate her, and live a life Happy with him. Seeing a girl whose hair is not tied with henna means that she will receive happy and abundant news in the coming period. Seeing an unmarried woman putting henna on her hair in a dream means that the person she is going to marry has good morals and loves and appreciates her. When an unmarried girl says that her hair Covered with henna, this is evidence that she is very close to God and is afraid of disobeying Him and performing the prayer on time. Interpretation of a dream about applying henna to the hair and washing it for a single person. Washing henna in a dream for an unmarried person indicates that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she faces in her life, and in the coming period she will hear the good news and enjoy happiness in life. The coming period, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about henna hair for a married woman. Seeing a married woman with henna hair in a dream symbolizes that she is far from God and is committing forbidden acts that God condemns and she must repent as quickly as possible and ask for forgiveness. A married woman who sees henna hair

title: Interpretation of seeing cockroaches flying in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of cockroaches by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing cockroaches in a dream as showing envy, and killing them in a dream indicates the end of that envy, just as cockroaches in a dream indicate bad friends who can do something that harms the dreamer or makes him feel bad. Sad, but soon he will overcome the attacks. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing cockroaches in a dream is that they are weak enemies or may indicate people who hate the dreamer and without leverage, and whoever sees himself failing to get rid of cockroaches in a dream, this means that he will. Feeling serious damage. Many cockroaches are a sign of illness or major problems, and whoever sees cockroaches coming out of the drain in his dream means that there is someone who performed magic on the dreamer and the dead cockroaches come back to life. Once again, it means the return of problems and obstacles more than before, and whoever sees cockroaches in his house in a dream, this indicates problems between family members. Interpretation of searching for cockroaches: Whoever sees himself searching for cockroaches in his dream, this is evidence that he is searching for enemies to get rid of them. Interpretation of cockroaches coming out From an open place: If a person sees cockroaches coming out of a hole or an open place in his dream, this is evidence of the presence of latent enemies and their plans against him. Interpretation of seeing dead cockroaches in a dream When a person sees dead cockroaches in a dream, this means that he will face difficulties and problems in his life, but he will overcome them soon. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in the bed. Seeing cockroaches on the bed in a dream is evidence of problems between the dreamer’s family, or it could be a sign of intense envy for them and that they are surrounded by bad people. Interpretation of seeing white cockroaches: Whoever sees a white cockroach in his dream, this means that someone is bewitching him. He approaches him and hides a lot of negative feelings from him and wants to harm him in various ways. Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches for unmarried women: Seeing cockroaches in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of a lot of envy towards her, or that she is surrounded by evil people and she must beware of them, or a sign that she will not enter into marriage with one of the evil people. A specific person.Interpretation of seeing cockroaches for a married woman. A married woman who sees cockroaches in her dream indicates that people are persecuting her and trying to separate her from her husband.Interpretation of seeing cockroaches for a pregnant woman. Scientists interpreted seeing cockroaches in a pregnant woman’s dream as a sign that her birth has been completed and that it will be easy and easy.

title: What is the interpretation of a house fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A house fire in a dream. There is no doubt that a house fire is one of the painful incidents that can cause material and human losses, so the interpretation of seeing a house fire in a dream is it harmful to the dreamer? As for the fact that it can refer to other concepts that differ from one opinion to another, we will learn that in the article through the most important opinions of major jurists and scholars such as Ibn Sirin. A house fire in a dreamDoes a house fire in a dream portend good or bad? Scientists have differed in answering this question, so it is not surprising to see different connotations: The interpretation of a dream about a burning house without seeing smoke or fire indicates the dreamer’s feeling of security and peace after a difficult period in his life. A house fire in a man’s dream may indicate that he earns money through usury and needs... To review oneself and stay away from doubt. If a married woman sees her house burning without smoke, this is evidence of abundant sustenance and legitimate gains. Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing an unmarried woman burning and seeing fire in her dream means a close marriage to a famous and wealthy person. A house of fire in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, mentioned by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, in his interpretation of a house fire, has several different connotations, such as: If the dreamer sees a burning glass house in his dream, then he is characterized by purity and hypocrisy and deceives others. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a house fire in a dream as a sign that the dreamer will suffer a great financial loss. A fire may indicate A house in a dream is a dream for a dreamer involved in debt to imprisonment and a prison sentence. A house fire in a dream for single people. In the interpretation of burning a house in a dream of an unmarried woman, jurists present the following cases: The interpretation of a dream of a fire in the house warns an unmarried woman that she will fall into turmoil, so she must adhere to With her high morals. If a girl sees her house burning in a dream and her father suffocating, this may mean that he is sick. Burning the house in the dreamer’s dream without serious damage may symbolize the passing of a minor crisis that you can solve. A house fire in the dream of the dreamer’s fiancée may indicate separation from her fiancé and going through a shock. Emotional. The fire in the neighbor’s house in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a fire in the neighbor’s house in the dream of an unmarried woman is a warning to her: If an unmarried woman sees a fire in her neighbor’s house in her dream, this may indicate that she is exposed to gossip and slander because of the delay in her marriage. Goes Some scholars are in another direction and believe that the interpretation of a girl seeing a burning fire in her neighbor’s house indicates the presence of someone planning a conspiracy against her in order to spoil her relationship with her neighbors and cause a clash between them. Interpretation of dreams about a house fire and extinguishing it for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a house fire and extinguishing it with water for a single woman indicates positive changes in House fire In a dream for a married woman: Seeing a house fire in a wife’s dream may be an undesirable matter

title: A detailed interpretation of urine in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: We look at the interpretation of urine in a dream for a single woman and its meaning in detail. The world of dreams is full of many strange and incomprehensible visions that make you wonder why you see such dreams, especially the dream of urinating or seeing urine in general. Its symbols in reality, and the most important question remains: Does this dream mean good or does it indicate something that the dreamer hates? We will answer this question as we provide you with an interpretation of urine in a dream in an encyclopedia. Interpretation of urine in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing an unmarried woman urinating in a dream generally means getting rid of the problems she suffers from in reality. Seeing urine in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates On her superiority and success in life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is urinating and the urine comes out in drops, then this vision indicates her inability to repay the debt or that she does not believe in reality. If an unmarried woman sees herself urinating on the bed, this vision symbolizes her The date of her wedding is approaching, and God knows best. Seeing urine in a dream in the form of milk indicates achieving goals, and this dream may also indicate the good reputation that the dreamer has in reality. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she cannot control her urine, then this vision It indicates a loss of the ability to control her life, in addition to being impulsive and reckless in making decisions. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is urinating in an unknown place, then this vision indicates happiness and joy for her. Seeing imprisoned urine in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the woman The person in the vision suffers from many problems and is unable to get rid of them. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is urinating in a house other than her own, then this vision indicates her marriage in that place or to one of the owners of the house, and God knows best. Seeing a large amount of urine in a person’s dream indicates On goodness and livelihood, it may mean that you will get a lot of money, and God knows best. The dream of urinating blood in the dream of an unmarried woman symbolizes the approaching date of marriage, and God knows best. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing urine in the dream of a single woman, and we must note in the end that all interpretations Mentioned in this article does not necessarily mean that it will come true because it is merely the jurisprudence of interpretation scholars, and in all cases, only God knows the unseen, and to interpret another dream you can download the Direct Dream Interpretation application.

If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is urinating and the urine comes out in drops, then this vision indicates her inability to repay the debt or that she does not believe in reality. If an unmarried woman sees herself urinating on the bed, this vision symbolizes her The date of her wedding is approaching, and God knows best. Seeing urine in a dream in the form of milk indicates achieving goals, and this dream may also indicate the good reputation that the dreamer has in reality. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she cannot control her urine, then this vision It indicates a loss of the ability to control her life, in addition to being impulsive and reckless in making decisions. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is urinating in an unknown place, then this vision indicates happiness and joy for her. Seeing imprisoned urine in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the woman The person in the vision suffers from many problems and is unable to get rid of them. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is urinating in a house other than her own, then this vision indicates her marriage in that place or to one of the owners of the house, and God knows best. Seeing a large amount of urine in a person’s dream indicates On goodness and livelihood, it may mean that you will get a lot of money, and God knows best. The dream of urinating blood in the dream of an unmarried woman symbolizes the approaching date of marriage, and God knows best. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing urine in the dream of a single woman, and we must note in the end that all interpretations Mentioned in this article does not necessarily mean that it will come true because it is merely the jurisprudence of interpretation scholars, and in all cases, only God knows the unseen, and to interpret another dream you can download the Direct Dream Interpretation application.

title: Learn more about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the appearance of a grandmother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a grandmother in a dream: Grandmother is a symbol of love and tenderness. We forget the unique taste of grandmother’s food. Are you confused and cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search on Google for the Egyptian dream interpretation website. What is the interpretation of seeing a grandmother in a dream? Seeing a grandmother in a dream is either a good or a bad interpretation, and its interpretation varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. The optimist sees the grandmother in good condition and with beautiful clothes, while the pessimist sees the grandmother in a shabby and ugly condition. Worn face or clothes. Seeing a living grandmother differs in its interpretation from seeing a dead grandmother, as a living grandmother is a sign of the world and her power, while a dead grandmother is often a sign of the afterlife. Some interpretive scholars also infer linguistic meaning when interpreting dreams. When looking in the dictionary About the word Jeddah, the meaning of Jeddah in the language is the riverbank or the face of the earth, which has a light, gentle and wonderful meaning. Easy effect. Grandmother means wealth and luxury, as well as happiness, greatness and luck, and grandparents are food, like grandfather something that has a new meaning. “I dreamed of my dead grandmother.” The major can wake up and say this phrase happily. Because he finally met his grandmother in some way, which made him forget his loneliness a little, and in this case the reason for seeing the dead grandmother is her longing, nostalgia, and intense desire to see her, which makes the subconscious mentally conjure his image. What is the interpretation of seeing a grandmother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing the deceased grandmother During a visitor's illness, it may mean death. Seeing a dead grandmother coming back to life indicates that she is in a great position or that she is doing a good job and is in a good position after her death. Seeing an ugly grandmother in a dream indicates disappointment and despair in addition to fear of the future. Seeing a grandmother In a man’s dream, it is good if he does not see her crying, as it means goodness in his life for the man. If a single man dreams of his grandmother returning to her youth, this means that his engagement or marriage is approaching. Interpretation of seeing a dead grandmother in a dream and its meaning for a single girl. If an unmarried woman sees herself praying with Her grandmother or sitting on her grandmother’s prayer rug, this is a sign of the girl’s safety. Interpretation of seeing a dead grandmother in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a married woman being visited by her grandmother indicates money and abundance of sustenance and may mean that her husband will become a big deal. Eating with the grandmother is a sign of the birth of a good new child What is the interpretation of seeing a sick grandmother in a dream? This dream may mean that the grandmother feels lonely and needs someone to make her feel comfortable. Perhaps the grandmother is facing problems and does not find anyone to help her. This dream may also indicate a financial gain that you may obtain because of your grandmother’s prayers. In the event that she sees the grandmother On her sick bed and her condition worsened, it is possible that this dream is a bad omen for her life. What is the interpretation of the death of my grandmother in a dream? If he died in a dream and then came back to life in the same dream, this means that he will be martyred after death. What is the interpretation of seeing my grandmother in a dream? Seeing a grandmother often indicates good and good news to the fortuneteller.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin, a prison is a place where human freedom is abandoned, as this place aims to bring a person or several people together, equipping this place with fences and iron bars to prevent people from escaping and appointing a guard for it, and seeing a prison in a dream, It indicates the many problems and tribulations that the dreamer faces, including sadness and anxiety. Prison indicates longevity and escape from prison, and good indicators indicate a way out of crises and adversity. Interpretation of the dream of seeing prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing prison, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, indicates the longevity of the dreamer. Seeing the dreamer in a dream choosing to be imprisoned by Fidel indicates his invincibility. From illness. Seeing an unknown prison in a dream shows the world and its problems. Interpretation of a dream about crying in prison. Seeing in a dream that he is crying in prison is a good dream, because it indicates the disappearance of his fears and pain. Seeing crying inside the prison walls represents the beginning of a new life full of joy and pleasure. Interpretation of a dream Getting out of prison: Seeing his release from prison after being acquitted is a sign of the collapse of fears and the solution of problems on the ground. Seeing the dreamer breaking chains or breaking down the prison door in a dream means that he has overcome adversities and problems and is seeking to solve them. Seeing a prison break also indicates that you are on the right track. A prisoner of injustice in a dream indicates the cruelty towards him and the injustice he is subjected to by society and people, and it also indicates the difficult circumstances he is going through. A dream of seeing a prison for a married woman: Seeing a married woman, as if she is visiting her husband in prison, indicates a feeling of anxiety. As for a married woman, she sees... In a dream, her husband is imprisoned, and in reality he was, and his appearance in the dream was beautiful. This indicates that he will soon be released and acquitted. Dream of seeing a prison for singles. Seeing an unmarried woman in prison in a dream means that she will marry a wealthy man. As for seeing her as if the prison doors were open, It means that her ambitions and desires that she is fighting for will come true. Dream of seeing a prison in a dream If you see a prison in a dream with its door open, this means that the dreamer will be saved from evil. Seeing a governor’s prison in a dream means that he is suffering from sadness for a long period of his life. Seeing a prison in A dream or seeing a prisoner in a dream indicates defects in worship. Seeing an imprisoned person outside the prison in a dream. Seeing a prisoner outside the prison means that he will be released soon, if in reality he is imprisoned. It indicates the release of distress and the repayment of debts. And seeing the prisoner outside the prison is as if he escaped from Prison, this is a good sign and indicates the end of worry and worry. Seeing a prisoner escaping is a sign of overcoming life’s problems and optimism after despair. To make positive changes in the fortuneteller’s life. Success and distinction in professional life. The vision also indicates repentance of sins. At the end of our article, we talked to you. In the previous lines, with sufficient and comprehensive information about the above topic, which is the interpretation of the dream of seeing a prison in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, we wish you dreams full of goodness and happiness as long as you are in God’s care and care.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Vesik in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing a fesik in a dream for a married woman and seeing a fesik in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals, as well as good luck and hearing good news. Eating fesikh can indicate a bad psychological state and may indicate illness. Seeing fesikh in a dream Fesikh is a type of salted fish that many people tend to eat, and when we see it in our dreams, we do not find the correct interpretation. Therefore, we will find out through the interpretation of the dream of fesikh in a dream, according to leading scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of the vision of fesikh by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of the dream of eating fesikh in a dream, according to what Ibn Sirin narrated, is that it is desirable; Because it is evidence that you have heard the good news. Dreaming about eating Physic in a dream can indicate many fears and sorrows that the dreamer may face in the coming period. Seeing food in a dream in general is a sign of the bad psychological state that the dreamer suffers from or the disease that may afflict him. The dream is Seeing buying feseekh in a dream is evidence of a major catastrophe that the dreamer may fall into and change his life for the worse. Interpretation of selling feseekh in a dream indicates solving problems and overcoming crises, obstacles and challenges that the dreamer may face. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream 1444 Seeing fishInterpretation of a dream about feseekh For a single woman: The interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is a sign and warning for someone close to her and they have an emotional relationship that can cause her a lot of sadness and pain. The dream of buying fesikh in a dream for a single woman is evidence of many problems and conflicts with family and friends, and a feeling of failure, despair and disappointment. Hope. Seeing fesik in a dream for unmarried women is evidence of the loss of someone close to her, the cancellation of her engagement, or the loss of one of her family members. Interpretation of a dream for a married woman: The interpretation of a dream about fesik in a married woman’s dream is evidence of many good things, and an increase in grace and blessings in life. Money and children. Seeing buying fesik in a dream for a married woman indicates many problems. Disagreements with the husband can lead to divorce and separation. Seeing selling fesik in a dream to a married woman is evidence of the disappearance of stress and anxiety. Healing after illness and happiness after sadness and patience. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing an octopus in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of a dream about fesikh for a pregnant woman: Seeing it without eating it in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a male child and he will be the source of her happiness after his birth. A dream about cleaning and cutting hair in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the ease of natural childbirth and confirmation of her safety and the safety of her child. Who has not yet been born. Read also: Interpretation of dreams to see grilled fish in a dream. Interpretation of a man’s vision of annulment: The dream of seeing physic in a man’s dream is evidence of the presence of a large amount of money and an increase in profits, if he is a merchant. Seeing selling physic in a dream is a sign of getting rid of Of debts, paying them off, and overcoming problems and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about eating salted fish for one woman: Seeing him eating flounder means a lot of goodness in the life of a woman.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a needle in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and the interpretation of a dream with a needle in the hand.

preview.html: Needle in a dreamSeeing a needle in a dream reflects different clues to the fortuneteller according to the details of the dream he saw and the circumstances of reality at the time he saw the dream. The meaning can be positive or negative, to warn the dreamer of something, and in both cases you will know from this article the interpretation of a dream about a needle in a dream by leading interpretation scholars. The needle in a dream The indicators conveyed by the dream interpretation of a needle in a dream vary between positive and negative depending on the nature of the dream, and its vision indicates a It is a year of a change in one’s position for the better on a personal or professional level and you pray for it. He is optimistic about the end of the material problems and psychological pressures that have besieged him for a long time, and knitting with a needle in a dream indicates good luck and success in achieving goals. But if the dream arrives that the dreamer breaks the needle in his hands, this means that he will enter a bad psychological situation that needs support and help to get out of it quickly, And if he plans to travel soon, he will. He suffers. Of some obstacles that delay it for a while, and if the dead person comes in a dream holding a needle, this is a sign of his need for prayer and friendship. The needle in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the needle in a dream moves to the general human interpretation with the end of difficult periods and the situation changes with the appearance of relief and comfort after distress. However, seeing a burned or broken needle in a dream means loss and failure. Sometimes a needle in a dream indicates the intention for the dreamer to repent and ask God for help to get rid of sins and disobedience, so the dream is a message of encouragement to start taking the first steps and not back down. You regret your hasty decisions and leave suitable opportunities. The needle in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq According to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of the dream of a needle in a dream, it is one of the symbols that portends the coming of goodness, comfort and well-being after long suffering. However, the interpretation of the dream differs if the dreamer sees some points connected to the needle, as they are present between the dreamer and his family. Also, breaking the needle in the dream means failure to achieve the goal and suffering from a serious psychological crisis that requires patience and help to overcome it quickly, while holding the needle heralds the arrival of news. Happy, such as success, marriage, or a happy event that brings family and loved ones together. Google the dream interpretation website on the Internet and get an accurate interpretation of your dream by leading scholars. A needle in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a needle in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates positive changes that are occurring in her life and that It makes her more stable and happy and often means her connection with the right person who she finds after a long time and looks forward to his specifications as a life partner, especially if she sees that she is sewing her own clothes and making an elegant dress with her. But if she sees the needle entering her hands and she is unable to get it out, this is a sign of the presence of a hypocritical and unjust man. Amin in her life claims that he loves her and hides the evil inside him and symbolizes the breaking of the needle. Her failure to achieve the goal she expected in her studies or at work, but she tried again and achieved, and lo and behold
